# HMCameraStreamState.starting

**Case**

The state when the camera stream start request is processing.

## Declaration

```swift
case starting
```

## Observing the streaming state

- **HMCameraStreamState.notStreaming**: The state when the camera stream is not active.
- **HMCameraStreamState.stopping**: The state when the camera stream is stopping.
- **HMCameraStreamState.streaming**: The state when the camera stream is currently in progress.
